data.event: Easton post office was established in 1881, moved in 1883, and closed in 1902.
Easton post office was established in 1881, moved in 1883, and closed in 1902.
Easton post office was established in 1881, moved in 1883, and closed in 1902.
The 2010 United States Census reported that Easton had a population of 2,083.
